did.unittitle: ILR School Office of Student Services MacIntyre Honors and Awards Program

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Office of Student Services

did.abstract: Program for the ILR School's MacIntyre Honors and Awards Dinner on April 15, 2003.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The MacIntyre Honors and Awards Dinner is named for Duncan MacIntyre, a teacher of Labor Economics in the ILR School from 1950 to 1975. The annual event recognizes the achievements of ILR faculty and students.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a program for the ILR School's MacIntyre Honors and Awards Dinner on April 15, 2003.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
